title: Kindred nerf.... Opinions?
body: What do you guys think about the kindred nerf? What difference will it make? Will it make them unplayable? Any thoughts on the clear after this nerf?

replies.body: I think its well deserved. That 70% slow was way to much for a targeted ability on already mobile champ.  I doubt it will make them unplayable (as much as I wish) but rather bring them in line with the rest of the junglers.
